isis.stitle: GAUGES AND WARNING LIGHTS - DESCRIPTION - PROGRAMMING

svcproc.title: PROGRAMMING
svcproc.para: The Speedo/Tach module can be programmed by using the DIP switches or with an electronic service tool (EST) connected to the data link with electronic engines. The Pro-Link® 9000 or the EZ-Tech with the instrument cluster software are the available ESTs. The module is programmed electronically at the factory and all DIP switches are physically in the zero position. The actual settings are on the vehicle lineset ticket or can be viewed using the Pro-Link 9000 or EZ-Tech ESTs. Refer to PROGRAMMING for additional programming information.
